name: Visitors: Marine Invasion
description: The full moon is a time when evil wakes up and strange things begin to happen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.30 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.40 GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1000 MB available space
